name: Pong with sonic physics
description:
This fan game is inspired from the animation by level up.

Check out the original video!!!

It is a 2 player game. So, you can also bring your friend along.

Also, you can control sonic with W and S keys and tails with I and K keys.

I named it PONIC because I didn't wanted to name it PONGNIK. 

This game is very similar to Level UP's video but not completely same as this game doesn't have all the things.

I'm going to add all others stuff too. So, stay subscribed to my YouTube channel and also this page.

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
